Articles.Content:
I've just started working on this as a kerbal space program movie, I think it'll be awesome!
I would tell you a bit about the plot but i don't want to spoil it for those of you who will want to watch the movie.
So yeah! Hope that you will be watching it when it's done Edited April 4, 2014 by Bearsh
Did you really just film you looping a B9 plane around and landing it badly- no explination or anything?
why exactly is the cargo bay open and the landing gear down THE ENTIRE TIME!?

why exactly is the cargo bay open and the landing gear down THE ENTIRE TIME!?

B9 Aerospace problem, When the real movie is finished that'll be fixed.

I had to update my b9 so i could close the bay doors.

Did you really just film you looping a B9 plane around and landing it badly- no explination or anything?

You don't understand the plot.

The plot is the plane needed to emergency land but the landing failed, So then they went M.I.A Nomatter all the searches.

If you really wanted to attract people to see a movie, you could've made it more cinematicy, wait till a new B9 fix is posted, or revert to 0.23, or something. Because, from this, I expect to just see you flying a helicopter around or something looking for the plane.
There's no exposition. Not only is it unentertaining to watch, nothing really happens. Not even some text.

There's no exposition. Not only is it unentertaining to watch, nothing really happens. Not even some text.

Well then i'll make a new trailer. I didn't have much time to make this one anyways.
Hey guys, Because i know it was a bit boring i'm making a new one and i've added some cool music to the first trailer in the meantime, So you won't just be listenining to the game boringly.
Well, it's better. Tip for smooth movies: Turn KRAKENSBANE physics delta time TO MAX and then speed up the video, it will look less choppy and laggy.

Well, it's better. Tip for smooth movies: Turn KRAKENSBANE physics delta time TO MAX and then speed up the video, it will look less choppy and laggy.

What? I didn't understand
In the settings, the physics delta time. You know, the thing that replaces lag with slow motion. Then use whatever editor you have to speed the video up from slow motion.
